actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code, to provide that personal delivery of notification of death of servicemen to the next-of-kin may be made only by officers.

summary.text: Provides that personal delivery of notification of death of servicemen to the next-of-kin be made only by commissioned officers or an officer appointed as chaplain. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 1042)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code, to provide that personal delivery of notification of death of servicemen to the next-of-kin may be made only by officers.
